channel.title: Album Endpoint on Music Database
channel.description: Recent content in Album Endpoint on Music Database

item.title: Album
item.description: The Album Model copyright: The copyright text. isComplete: (Required) Indicates whether the album is complete. If true, the album is complete; otherwise, it is not. An album is complete if it contains all its tracks and songs. default is false isSingle: (Required) Indicates whether the album contains a single song. default is false name: (Required) The localized name of the album. recordLabel: (Required) The name of the record label for the album.

item.title: Album Attach Artist
item.description: Attach an Artist to given Album. POST /api/albums/{albumid}/artists Example Body Params: { "artists": [ "1607d150-861c-4782-8c1b-abe58254373b" ] } Response is 204 NoContent

item.title: Album Detach Artist
item.description: Detach an Artist from given Album. DELETE /api/albums/{albumid}/artists Example Body Params: { "artists": [ "1607d150-861c-4782-8c1b-abe58254373b" ] } Response is 204 NoContent

item.title: Album Tracks
item.description: Alert Albums are working with Tracks not with Songs. Under the hood it’s the same entity. Create or Link Track with Album This endpoint allows you to Link an Album -> Song relation or create a new Artist with Relation. If no id is provided a new Album will be created. POST /api/albums/{albumID}/tracks If the Track you want to link exists you can POST { "id": "1607d150-861c-4782-8c1b-abe58254373b" } If you want to create a new Album:
